Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.DrawingItem

Packages that use DrawingItem
edu.rit.draw Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds. 
edu.rit.draw.item Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing. 
 

Uses of DrawingItem in edu.rit.draw
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw with parameters of type DrawingItem
 void Drawing.add(DrawingItem theItem)
          Add the given drawing item to the end of this drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 void Drawing.addFirst(DrawingItem theItem)
          Add the given drawing item to the beginning of this drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 

Uses of DrawingItem in edu.rit.draw.item
 

Subclasses of DrawingItem in edu.rit.draw.item
 class Arc
          Class Arc provides a DrawingItem that is a circular arc.
 class Bow
          Class Bow provides a DrawingItem that joins two points with a curved (bowed) line.
 class Ellipse
          Class Ellipse provides an ellipse DrawingItem.
 class FilledItem
          Class FilledItem is the abstract base class for a DrawingItem that has an outline and is filled with a paint.
 class Group
          Class Group provides a DrawingItem that consists of a group of other DrawingItems.
 class Image
          Class Image provides a DrawingItem containing an image.
 class Line
          Class Line provides a DrawingItem that consists of one or more straight line segments.
 class OutlinedItem
          Class OutlinedItem is the abstract base class for a DrawingItem that has an outline.
 class Oval
          Class Oval provides an oval DrawingItem.
 class Polygon
          Class Polygon provides a polygon DrawingItem whose boundary consists of one or more straight line segments.
 class Rectangle
          Class Rectangle provides a rectangle DrawingItem.
 class RectangularItem
          Class RectangularItem is the abstract base class for a DrawingItem that has an outline, is filled with a paint, and occupies a rectangular area of a certain size at a certain location.
 class ShapeItem
          Class ShapeItem is the abstract base class for a DrawingItem that consists of a single 2-D graphics shape with an outline and an interior.
 class Text
          Class Text provides a textual DrawingItem.
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw.item that return DrawingItem
 DrawingItem DrawingItem.add()
          Add this drawing item to the end of the default drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 DrawingItem DrawingItem.add(Drawing theDrawing)
          Add this drawing item to the end of the given drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 DrawingItem DrawingItem.addFirst()
          Add this drawing item to the beginning of the default drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 DrawingItem DrawingItem.addFirst(Drawing theDrawing)
          Add this drawing item to the beginning of the given drawing's sequence of drawing items.
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type DrawingItem
 Group Group.append(DrawingItem theItem)
          Add the given drawing item to the end of this group's list of drawing items.
 Group Group.prepend(DrawingItem theItem)
          Add the given drawing item to the beginning of this group's list of drawing items.
 

Constructors in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type DrawingItem
DrawingItem(DrawingItem theItem)
          Construct a new drawing item that is the same as the given drawing item.
